title: Keurig® KOLD™– Make a Drink
description: Learn the essential steps you need to take to make a beverage with your Keurig® KOLD™ Drinkmaker.

asset.author: Keurig Inc
asset.hookText: Learn the essential steps you need to take to make a beverage with your Keurig® KOLD™ Drinkmaker.

transcripts: It's so simple to make your favorite drinks with Keurig Kold. Be sure to store your pods at room temperature, between 60 and 80 degrees Fahrenheit. Choose your pod and remove the freshness seal. Line up the notch here and place your cold pod in the drink maker. Then press the handle down firmly. Push the cold button. And in about 90 seconds, your perfectly chilled beverage will be ready. Remove the pod after making each beverage. The pod will be warm-to-the-touch. All your favorites, fresh made at the push of a button.
